sections.heading: committee; budget.The governing body of the county shall annually set the budget, if any, under which the committee shall operate

sections.text:
81-3718.Visitors committee; budget.

The governing body of the county shall annually set the budget, if any, under which the committee shall operate.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 499, § 12;R.S.1943, (2008), § 81-1256;Laws 2012, LB1053, § 18.
